short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send your scanned receipts / bills to your favourite expense document capture software. Supports HubDoc and Dext Prepare.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're using any Expense Management software that supports Email-In documents to capture, this is the Ultimate tool that you will ever need to bulk upload images or PDF documents in just under a second and let this tool send emails for you. 

Compatible with Xero Expense, Quickbooks Expense, HubDoc, Dext Prepare, Expensify and more...
